channel.title: NigScape Beta Server [ Testers In-Need ] RitzScape Based
channel.description:
[size=12pt] [b]Server is currently down as of right now, doing some coding and fixing up abit. Making website and etc. Server will be online asap. 8/11/14[/b]
Hi, this is Tyler. I am the owner of [b]NigScape[/b]. I have resently hosted my private server a couple years ago. Many people used to play it. but i have falling outof contact with most people. So now i am [b]in-need [/b] of some beta testers to test out the newest version of [b]NigScape[/b]. There is many updates. The server used to be based on the server [b]RitzScape[/b], but some people got kinda of tired of it. So i have re-updated alot of things and just want some people to check it out and make sure it is okay for people and if possibly someone people would enjoy.
[size=14pt][b]Anyone is welcome. [/b] [/size] The people that figure out themos bugs or suggestions to the game willearn something of their choice and my agreement. Would like to try it out, all you have to do is download the client below. [size=10pt][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?5t1odogfcex5mgx[/url] [b]UPDATED[/b][/size] Then just run the client, create a username and password, login, and enjoy.
Any other information needed, please contact me @: [size=10pt][email]typrizza@live.com[/email][/size] [size=14pt][b]Have a fun tme gaming and enjoy![/b][/size]
Dont forget to vote :) • [url=http://www.top100arena.com/in.asp?id=85620]http://www.top100arena.com/in.asp?id=85620 [/url][/size]

item.title: NigScape Beta Server [ Testers In-Need ] RitzScape Based
item.dc:creator: @gfram101 gfram101
item.description:
@gfram101 wrote:

Hey!

The black box gives me a massive error when loading the client. It doesn’t work for me and I used the “theme” one too and that didn’t do anything. I was just hoping I could get any help?

I tried updating my Java.
I moved to my desktop too see if that did any difference.

Any tips would do, Thanks!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @PvPKid0rg PvPKid0rg
item.description:
@PvPKid0rg wrote:

[quote=“TyPrizza, post:25, topic:545803”][quote author=furyking50 link=topic=664687.msg4443550#msg4443550 date=1407722640]
Nobody is on when I’m on
[/quote]
Not to many people know that the server is back online.
i would tell you friends about it so you have friends that play.
or tell people, alot if people know about the server, ritzscape.
everyone enjoyed it unless they didnt get staff and got pissed.
but other than that it was an amazing rsps.

When is this server going to go up?..
I keep getting a error?

the problem might be that you downloaded the bad client, i change the ip so the newer client above where it says ‘Updated’ where the old link was is the new client. should work if have problems,
send me an email or private message.[/quote]Still doesn’t work for me… Also your inbox is to big… so wont let me send

Read full topic

item.title: NigScape Beta Server [ Testers In-Need ] RitzScape Based
item.dc:creator: @TyPrizza TyPrizza
item.description:
@TyPrizza wrote:

Server is currently down atm. making some minor touch up to the server. and also working on getting a vps so there wont be problems with down time and such.

also, as of right now. i am talking to the old owner of ritzscape and currently trying to get the old server up and running again. it might take a some time but it will be back as soon as possible, since alot of people liked the server and players are still talking about it and still have intentions for it.
ritzscape is coming back believe it or not.

sorry about the title of the server, it was voted by many people not because of racism but because of story behind it.

Client Update: Login Fixed. Dl: http://www.mediafire.com/?5t1odogfcex5mgx

EDIT: Server is ONLINE.

Read full topic
